text: AWS supports a shared responsibility
model and we provide you with the tools
to manage access and identities to help
you secure your AWS resources that means
you need your access management controls
to operate the way you intend and scale
as your organization grows the I am
policy language lets you define who can
access what and under what conditions
the I am policy language is powerful and
flexible and you need proper tools to
manage permission roles as you scale on
AWS policies typically determine access
to resources as you add new workloads
you need an easy and quick way to ensure
your permissions meet your governance
rules that's why AWS Powers many of its
governance checks with zelkova to help
you automate identification of
permissions that fall outside your
governance rules ensuring security at an
even higher level by minimizing human
error and providing Access Control
assurances zelkova uses formal reasoning
technology applying math-based proofs
and principles to prove that a policy
meets the necessary security standards
it also checks that the policy does
indeed Grant or restrict access as
intended this enables you to efficiently
remediate any possible misconfigurations
of Access Control policies and
proactively identify and adjust
unintended privilege escalations as
policies evolve and grow grow with your
organization aws's mechanisms for
automated remediations meet even the
most stringent security requirements and
since zova can handle the largest and
most complex policies it will provide
assurances about the security posture of
your entire identity and access
management get started with zova today
